title: Are we Beta no more?
content:
I think I prefer the animated T to the revolving 5.

Any news on the Resources and Projects (and subscription)?

Keep up the good work.

Richard

 [‹ Eurovision Song Contest](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112163819/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20090 "Go to previous forum topic") [TrueType Versus Postscript ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112163819/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16695 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Richard Hards

comments.content:
About time!

Appreciate the good work, I hope this is an indication of further improvement yet to come, especially subscription.

Clear out your caches! :^)

We have been waiting with Beta’d breath :-)  
ChrisL

Now we can carry on una-beta’d.  
:-)

ChrisL
mo-beta. less beta. (sorry, this is chris’s fault.)
I think we should stop all this nonsense, or we might get beta’n
Cute animation, fo’ sho, but I’m not celebrating until the major bugs are fixed.
